GameIntroduction:
Welcome to The Haunted Shack!
You can explore different locations, interact with items, and solve puzzles to progress.
Here are the available commands:
- 'move [direction]' to move in a specific direction.
- 'take [item]' to take an item and add it to your inventory.
- 'look' to get a description of your current surroundings.
- 'inventory' to view the items you are carrying.
- 'help' to display available commands.
- 'save' to save your game.
- 'quit' to exit the game.
Good luck, adventurer!

Locations.Name: Living Room
Locations.Description:
You are in the living room.
There is an old rug on the floor, a bookshelf to the west, a chest to the east, and an open door to what looks like a kitchen to the north.

Locations.Name: Bookshelf
Locations.Description:
The bookshelf is in complete disarray.
As you look over the books whose pages are moldy with age, a glint catches your eye, a Rusty Key.

Locations.Name: Chest
Locations.Description:
The chest looks ancient and mysterious.
You test and find the chest is unlocked! What great fortune.
You look through the contents of the chest, and it is mostly rags and paper. However, you notice something sharp, a Sword!

Locations.Name: Secret Area in Living Room
Locations.Description:
As you approach the rug, you notice an unusual lump under it.
As you lift it up, there's a faint glow coming from underneath â€” a Magic Knife!
What a valuable find!

Locations.Name: Kitchen
Locations.Description:
There is so much dust and debris in the kitchen it's hard to tell what's in here.
To the south lies the Living Room, to the north is a closed door. There is a fridge to the west side of the room and a very sludgy sink to the east.

Locations.Name: Closed Door
Locations.Description:
An ancient-looking door stands in your way.
You test the door handle and push, but it doesn't budge. Locked.
If only there was some way to unlock it...

Locations.Name: Sink
Locations.Description:
You look into the rusty sink, and it is filled with brown slime.
There's no way you're touching that.
You open the drawers under the sink and find a single rusted Mug.

Locations.Name: Fridge
Locations.Description:
There is a fridge that looks in relatively good condition... and it seems to be working!
You open the fridge and then close it again, vomiting a little in your mouth.
You never want to open that fridge again!
As you look down though you notice a old pot.... wait...Thats a shield. You found a shield.

Locations.Name: Boss Room
Locations.Description: You've entered a dimly lit chamber. The air is thick, and you can feel an ominous presence.
